Author: communalistwitch
Text: Not 12 years, but same with me and meat for the last two years (and with animal products for about a year). I think it’s because I got onto these paths through motivations bigger than me – like, environmentalism. But when it comes to ending binges in general I can’t reframe it that way.

Author: n0kikin0ki
Text: i'm a vegetarian too. i think it's a hard one to compare because whenever i see meat now, i just think of cruelty and death. it's hard to make a negative connection like that with junk food because a lot of it is actually vegetarian. i was vegan for 3 years and that definitely helped me kick the junk food because it's so hard to find vegan stuff (except oreos - these were literally my demise back in the day).
